ing: 1 large seedless watermelon, cut into 1-inch cubes
1 pinch coarse salt, or to taste
1 pinch ground black pepper, or to taste
des: "The quintessential summer salad with lots of lycopene. Tomatoes and watermelon are a match made in heaven! Perfect with grilled meat on a hot day! This is best served at room temperature. Dress the salad right before you eat it."
ins:
Gently mix watermelon, tomatoes, mint, onion, and feta cheese in a large bowl.
Whisk olive oil, vinegar, salt, and pepper together in small bowl; drizzle over salad and gently toss to coat.
